expo.name: Boowme
expo.description: Boowme is the world's first dating app that offers anti-ghosting functionality along with curated conversations and notifications. With a focus on Arabic culture, Boowme promotes genuine human connections, helping people build and nurture meaningful relationships and healthier bonds. We've broken the rules of dating apps to provide a safe and secure environment where interactions and conversations are filtered and limited. Users have full control over their conversations, resulting in no wasted time and selective exchanges.
